i play for the washington wizards.

participant_2.background:
I am always striving to improve myself.
I try to start my mornings with a fresh cup of coffee and a healthy breakfast.
I love cooking and my favorite food is what I prepare in my home.
my hair is short.
we plan to travel after he retires.

content.text: What are you up to today?
Just getting ready for the day. I have a long day ahead of me.
What kind of things do you have planned?
I have a job interview at 10 am, then I have to go shopping for groceries, and then I have a work meeting at 4 pm.
Sounds like a busy day! What kind of job are you interviewing for?
I'm interviewing to be a personal assistant. I'm hoping I get the job.
I'm sure you'll do great! I'm rooting for you.
I love to cook and bake. I also love to read and play video games.
I love cooking too! What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love to make pasta. I can make a lot of different types of pasta.
That's awesome! I'm not very good at cooking. I usually order out.
Oh, you should learn to cook! It's so much fun and it's a great way to save money.
I know, I know. I'm going to try to learn more.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be a great cook.
